metadata.title: TECNII 20 Inch Widescreen LED Backlit LCD Desktop PC Monitor HD+ Resolution - 3ms Response Time - HDMI - VGA - for Home, Office - Black, TM200
features: Expansive horizontal and vertical viewing angles ensure uniform viewing from above, below and either side.
Flexible connectivity options: TECNII 20 inch Monitor including HDMI, VGA port connecting to all your secondary devices at once is both easy and convenient. It supports laptops, PCs and more.
GREAT FOR HOME AND OFFICE: An ideal all-around display for desktop, or laptop. Enhanced viewing comfort and lower energy consumption.
100 x 100 VESA support allows you to mount the monitor on a wall.
Included in the box: TECNII 20 inch Monitor, Power cord and Cable, HDMI Cable.
description: Experience HD+ resolution on the monitor you use every day and amazing screen performance take your productivity to the next level with superb resolution. Excellent connectivity and flexible viewing options help boost productivity further. Enjoy easy compatibility with both legacy and new PCs via HDMI and VGA connectivity.SPECIFICATIONBrand: TECNIIResolution: HD+ 1600 x 900Standard Contrast Ratio: 1000:1Aspect ratio: 16:10Brightness (typical): 250 cd/m²Viewing angle (typical): 178° / 178°Response Time: 3 msDisplay Type: Widescreen Panel DisplayScreen Type: LCD Panel, TN (LED Backlight)Connectivity: 1 x HDMI 1.4, 1 x VGAIncluded Accessories: Monitor with Stand and Power cord, HDMI Cable: 90 Days Hardware
